question: A plumber works for 5 weeks every month and for 7 days every week. If he gets paid £120 every day, how much does he earn if he works for a year?
answer:
The plumber works for 7 days every week and works for 5 weeks every month so he works for 7 days/week * 5 weeks/month = <<7*5=35>>35 days/month
If he earns £120 every day he then earns £120/day * 35 days/month = £<<120*35=4200>>4200/month
A year is equal to 12 months so every year he earns £4200/month * 12 months/year = £<<4200*12=50,400>>50,400
#### 50,400
